nodes.title: Steve Jobs
nodes.introduction: Steven Paul Jobs was an American business magnate, industrial designer, investor, and media proprietor

nodes.title: Tim Cook

nodes.title: Jony Ive
nodes.introduction: A British-American industrial and product designer. Ive was Chief Design Officer (CDO) of Apple Inc., and serves as Chancellor of the Royal College of Art
